cards.markdown:
I really can’t decide if this piece of work by NYT journalist David Pogue is really clever and amusing, or just plain painful:

<object height="350" width="425"><param name="movie" value="http://www.youtube.com/v/vniMR6Ez9cE"></param><param name="wmode" value="transparent"></param><embed height="350" src="http://www.youtube.com/v/vniMR6Ez9cE" type="application/x-shockwave-flash" width="425" wmode="transparent"></embed></object>

Still, experimentation is good and it beats most of the “queuing for the iPhone” videos
